title: Add job description archive
description: Save job descriptions with metadata for future reference. Store JD text, company, role, date saved, source URL, and link to any generated resumes. Useful for comparing roles and tracking what you've applied to.

title: Create standalone /cover-letter skill
description: Create a dedicated `/cover-letter` skill for generating tailored cover letters. Should follow similar patterns to resume-builder: takes LinkedIn PDF + job description, outputs HTML cover letter to output/ directory.

title: Add automated PDF export via Puppeteer/Playwright
description: Create a CLI tool/script to convert generated HTML resumes and cover letters to PDF automatically, eliminating the manual Chrome print step. Use Puppeteer or Playwright for accurate rendering with A4 sizing.

title: Add ATS keyword analysis to resume-builder
description: Add optional `--analyze` flag to resume-builder skill that shows a keyword match report after generation: which JD keywords were included, which are missing, frequency analysis, and suggestions for improvement.

title: Create application tracker
description: Simple file-based (JSON/YAML) tracker for job applications. Fields: company, role, date applied, status (applied/interviewing/rejected/offer), resume file used, JD link, notes. Store in project root as applications.yaml or similar.

title: Create /interview-prep skill
description: Generate likely interview questions based on job description + candidate's resume. Include suggested talking points and answers. Identify potential gap areas the interviewer might probe.

title: Add resume validator
description: Create a validator that checks resumes for common issues: employment gaps, inappropriate length for target region, missing critical sections, ATS compatibility issues, spelling/grammar concerns.

title: Create /template-builder skill
description: Create a `/template-builder` skill for interactive template customization. Allow user to customize: colors, fonts, section order, spacing, header style. Preview with sample data during iteration. Save as reusable template file. Resume-builder should use custom template if exists, fall back to default otherwise.
